backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing account creation, user profiles, and admin‑gated account queries using role‑based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions configuring colors, dark mode, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with updated title TelsFX.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, layout, and page components including new admin‑help route.
UI gate that checks Internet Identity login and admin status, showing login prompts or access denial with principal info.
frontend/src/components/DisclaimerNotice: Empty placeholder file for the disclaimer notice component.
frontend/src/components/GetStartedForm.t: Account creation form handling input validation, submission, and success flow using a createAccount mutation.
frontend/src/components/GreenSectionCard: A styled Card wrapper applying green gradient theming and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ProfileTile.tsx: Displays a user profile avatar with name, optional title, and optional placeholder badge.
frontend/src/components/RouteTransitionO: Shows a full‑screen loading overlay during route transitions.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying recognition content, Tesla‑related companies, legal links, and navigation using route transitions.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with navigation, logo, and mobile menu using route transition handling.
frontend/src/components/UsersWorldwideKp: Fetches account stats and animates a rising user count KPI display.
frontend/src/config/admin.ts: Defines the admin principal constant to control admin access.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for account creation, fetching account stats, listing accounts, managing user profiles, and checking admin status via an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteTransition.ts: Implements a context and hook for timed route transitions with a brief loading state and automated cleanup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme CSS variables for light and dark modes, and custom scrollbar utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessPlansPage.tsx: Displays selectable partnership plans and triggers a route transition to the signup page with chosen plan metadata.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHelpPage.tsx: Provides admin instructions for obtaining and configuring an Internet Identity Principal.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUsersPage.tsx: Wraps an admin-only table that loads and displays all user accounts, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, KPI display, and feature cards, using route transition to navigate after signup.
frontend/src/pages/PlanSignupPage.tsx: Signup form page validating user input and creating an account tied to a selected plan before redirecting to success.
frontend/src/pages/PlanSuccessPage.tsx: Success screen confirming account creation and prompting users to continue setup on Telegram.
frontend/src/pages/PlanTelegramPage.tsx: Page directing users to join a Telegram channel with steps explaining what happens next.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Scrollable privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, and disclosure details.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Product categories page listing sustainable tech offerings with icons, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/pages/TelegramPage.tsx: Standalone Telegram CTA page guiding users to join the official community to complete their setup.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the Terms & Conditions page with scrollable legal text inside a styled card layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for ongoing development.
